## Public Member Functions

### getAnalysisUsage() {#a48f7d5a8f72495d4935141353576299b}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void StaticDataSplitter::getAnalysisUsage (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/analysisusage">AnalysisUsage</a> &amp; AU) const</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
getAnalysisUsage - Subclasses that override getAnalysisUsage must call this.

For MachineFunctionPasses, calling AU.preservesCFG() indicates that the pass does not modify the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> CFG.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/staticdatasplitter-cpp/#l00073">73</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/staticdatasplitter-cpp">StaticDataSplitter.cpp</a>.

### getPassName() {#a479c8f8ea0a22145fc1804a576cbf4bf}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="StringRef StaticDataSplitter::getPassName () const"
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
getPassName - Return a nice clean name for a pass.

This usually implemented in terms of the name that is registered by one of the Registration templates, but can be overloaded directly.
